results.title: Born for us
results.creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
The continuing story of the life of Jesus Christ from: Joseph and Mary’s arrival in Bethlehem; the birth of Jesus; the census in Bethlehem; the gifts of the Magi; Herod’s rage and the killing of the Innocents and the flight to Egypt.

results.title: Counter attacks
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Judo”.
Having learnt the many techniques and the various factors which influence the way these techniques are used, the next stop is to learn how they can be linked. There are two main linking techniques - defensive and offensively; defensive linkage is known as countering. Counter take several forms, the value of which will depend largely upon the attitude of the person using them. Specific counters demonstrated are osoto-gaeshi, uchi-mata-gaeshi, an ippon-seoi-counter, waki-gatame and speed counters.
results.description:

results.title: He who calls
results.creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 6 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
The continuing story of the life of Jesus Christ from: Jesus in the house of Jairus; the raising of Jairus’ daughter; Salome asks for John the baptist’s head; John is murdered; Judas approaches Jesus to become his disciple.

results.title: Wild at Heart
results.brief_description: A personal account created by a participant in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop “Journeys with Breast Cancer” Created in association with Breast Cancer Network Australia. “They say tragedy comes in threes, my mum’s cancer, my brother’s accident and now me.”

results.title: Friend of sinners
results.creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 7 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
The continuing story of the life of Jesus of Nazareth from: the shame of Mary Magdalene; the Rich Young Man approaches Jesus; the miracle of the loaves and the fishes; Zealots and Judas discuss the work of Jesus; Simon the Zealot follows Jesus; in the house of Simon the Pharisee; Joseph of Arimathea converses with Jesus; Mary Magdelene washes Jesus’ feet with her hair, Jesus forgives her sins.

results.title: The Son of God crucified
results.creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 13 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
The continuing story of the life of Jesus Christ from: Pilate allows the crowds to choose between Jesus and Barrabas, the crowd chooses Barrabas; Jesus leaves the Praetorium carrying the cross; He is led through the streets of Jerusalem; Jesus sees Nicodemus and is met by the pious woman; on Calvary Jesus is nailed and hung on a cross between two thieves; The Centurion allows Mary and the women to stand at the foot of the cross; Jesus talks to his mother and John; Jesus dies on the cross and is taken down.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia

results.title: Jesus of Nazareth
results.creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description: This is a special catechetical edition of Zeffirelli’s film, divided into 14 distinct parts, running for a total time of 7 hours. Starring Robert Powell as Jesus Christ, Peter Ustinov as Herod, Olivia Hussey as the Virgin Mary, Michael York as John the Baptist, Anne Bancroft as Mary Magdelene, and James Farentino as the Apostle Peter, this is the tale of the life and death of Jesus Christ, from the time of his birth until his crucifixion.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.description: This is a special catechetical edition of Zeffirelli’s film, divided into 14 distinct parts, running for a total time of 7 hours. Starring Robert Powell as Jesus Christ, Peter Ustinov as Herod, Olivia Hussey as the Virgin Mary, Michael York as John the Baptist, Anne Bancroft as Mary Magdelene, and James Farentino as the Apostle Peter, this is the tale of the life and death of Jesus Christ, from the time of his birth until his crucifixion.
description_for_label: This is a special catechetical edition of Zeffirelli’s film, divided into 14 distinct parts, running for a total time of 7 hours. Starring Robert Powell as Jesus Christ, Peter Ustinov as Herod, Olivia Hussey as the Virgin Mary, Michael York as John the Baptist, Anne Bancroft as Mary Magdelene, and James Farentino as the Apostle Peter, this is the tale of the life and death of Jesus Christ, from the time of his birth until his crucifixion.
